note: All six sub-claims verified against arXiv:2601.08908 (Draft.tex): (1) q=1 reduction trivially correct, (2) tetrahedron 1/sqrt(j) suppression confirmed via PR formula (line 577), (3) cube (log j)/j suppression confirmed from 12j asymptotics (line 622), (4) melonic SD = N=2 SYK confirmed (line 528), (5) Ponzano-Regge formula verified: cosine argument matches standard PR via identity cos(6J*arccos(1/3)+3pi/4)=cos(Regge_action+pi/4) for integer j, prefactor matches to leading order, (6) Euclidean 3D gravity connection is standard PR interpretation.
